I don't think he was pushed aside, but he may have been nudged, he said, adding that between the two founders, Mr. Page always appeared more interested in eventually becoming chief executive. "Clearly Sergey Brin has been paying less attention to management than Larry," he said.

shake-up. Current Google CEO Eric Schmidt will serve as the company's executive chairman. Co-founder Sergey Brin will devote his time to strategic projects, in particular working on new products, the company said. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a statement. Torture Team tells the story of attorney Philippe Sands ' investigation of Donald Rumsfeld 's 2002 memo, authorizing the new interrogation techniques that led to torture at Guantanamo Bay and beyond. May well be the best bit of contemporary investigative journalism you will read: it is right up there with Woodward and Bernstein, a tour de force of relentlessly dogged pursuit, of interviews with guilty men acquired against all odds, a beautifully told and humane narrative that follows a paper trail and nails the truth, according to the Sunday Times in the United Kingdom.
